text: Ivan McIntosh (14 December 1913 – 19 April 1970) was a former Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Ivan McIntosh's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1913 births Category:1970 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Ivan McIntosh
